tokens.definition: אַמָּה ʼammâh, am-maw'; prolonged from H517 ; properly, a mother (i.e. unit of measure, or the fore-arm (below the elbow), i.e. a cubit; also a door-base (as a bond of the entrance):—cubit, + hundred (by exchange for H3967 ), measure, post.
